comment.author: 21810244@N04
comment._content:
i know some of these kids and adults.
top left in blue shirt is David Maracle (my brother); next to him is my uncle Carl Brant; 
top right corner is Lorraince Hill (teacher, Quinte Mohawk School) and her husband Chief Earl  Hill.  My sister is on the bottom sitting the third from the right hand side (Christine Maracle).  I don`t know who the man in the center is (with the head dress on).

Mrs. Hill taught traditional dancing to her students.  My younger brother and I also danced but not with this class as we were alot younger.

Thank you,
Becky (Maracle)

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: Thanks for all the information Becky - that's great! I'll update the description.
